CIPHER.341.cipherString: There is always another way, make sure you look in all directions before deciding to give up.
CIPHER.341.question: A quote by Anamika Mishra has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.341.author: Anamika Mishra

CIPHER.327.cipherString: Oh! breathe not his name, let it sleep in the shade, Where cold and unhonoured his relics are laid.
CIPHER.327.question: Decode this quote by Thomas Moore which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.327.author: Thomas Moore

CIPHER.340.cipherString: Un sue√±o no se hace realidad por arte de magia, necesita sudor, determinaci√≥n y trabajo duro.
CIPHER.340.question: A quote by Colin Powell in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.340.author: Colin Powell
CIPHER.340.translation: A dream doesn't come true by magic, it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

CIPHER.333.cipherString: Music is love in search of a word.
CIPHER.333.question: The following quote by Sidney Lanier needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=3.
CIPHER.333.author: Sidney Lanier

CIPHER.334.cipherString: A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect.
CIPHER.334.question: A quote by Haruki Murakami has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word CAN.
CIPHER.334.author: Haruki Murakami

CIPHER.332.cipherString: You have to dream dreams to live dreams.
CIPHER.332.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Eric Lindros using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text UP FOR ROMAN CARGO ABOVE ABYSS decodes to be LIVED
CIPHER.332.author: Eric Lindros

CIPHER.330.cipherString: The goal of life is to make everyone and everything around you happy. With your act of kindness and compassion.
CIPHER.330.question: A quote by Shree Shambav has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.330.author: Shree Shambav

CIPHER.329.cipherString: Deal with the world the way it is, not the way you wish it was.
CIPHER.329.question: A quote by John Chambers has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with DEAL WITH.
CIPHER.329.author: John Chambers

CIPHER.328.cipherString: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit.
CIPHER.328.question: A quote by Napoleon Hill has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.328.author: Napoleon Hill

CIPHER.318.cipherString: Failures are with heroic minds the stepping-stones to success.
CIPHER.318.question: A quote by Haliburton has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ONESTO somewhere in it.
CIPHER.318.author: Haliburton

CIPHER.319.cipherString: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
CIPHER.319.question: The following quote by James Thurber needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of PAUSE
CIPHER.319.author: James Thurber

CIPHER.322.cipherString: Identifying your core values and goals is an incredibly important step on the road to achieving success.
CIPHER.322.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.322.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.337.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 9103756 45108 0842769. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.336.cipherString: wee mussed knot taek hte faults of hour oyuth into our lod age; for old age brings with it it's own defects.
CIPHER.336.question: Decode a quote by Goethe that was encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.336.author: Goethe

CIPHER.323.cipherString: Because you are alive, everything is possible.
CIPHER.323.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.323.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

CIPHER.331.cipherString: It is useless to attempt to reason a man out of a thing he was never reasoned into.
CIPHER.331.question: The following quote by Swift needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of STORE and polybius key of GASOLINE.
CIPHER.331.author: Swift

CIPHER.339.cipherString: Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life. A child is given to the universe to be educated.
CIPHER.339.question: A quote by Frederick William Robertson has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it begins with INSTR.
CIPHER.339.author: Frederick William Robertson

CIPHER.320.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53761 5478 89372 03471. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.324.cipherString: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
CIPHER.324.question: A quote by Trey Anastasio has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the words OF and MY.
CIPHER.324.author: Trey Anastasio

CIPHER.325.cipherString: Clear thinking at the wrong moment can stifle creativity.
CIPHER.325.question: Baconian Sequence Quote Author: Karl Lagerfeld
CIPHER.325.author: Karl Lagerfeld

CIPHER.335.cipherString: Be content with your uniqueness in this world and live a life of happiness.
CIPHER.335.question: The following quote by Gift Gugu Mona needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LEARN and polybius key of VANDERBILT.
CIPHER.335.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.338.cipherString: Guard yourself with a positive attitude, conviction, hope and fulfillment of your heart's desire.
CIPHER.338.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word AND.
CIPHER.338.author: Sunday Adelaja

CIPHER.321.cipherString: Dream big and aim higher, give the universe permission to show you what's possible if you don't limit yourself!
CIPHER.321.question: Decode this quote by Felecia Etienne which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.321.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.326.cipherString: Live life on your terms, make decisions based on facts and not on opinions, and blaze your own path.
CIPHER.326.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word PATH.
CIPHER.326.author: Felecia Etienne
